clinical_history: Pelvic pain with suspected ovarian pathology.
technique: Color Doppler and spectral analysis performed where necessary.
findings: Liver appears mildly thickened with no focal lesions.
Prostate is hyperechoic; volume approximately 15.84 cc.
Gallbladder shows well-defined, no stones or wall thickening.
Common bile duct measures 21.46 mm, within normal limits.
